mapper.insert: insert into charge_standard (id, name, statusId,modeId) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select charge_standard.id, name, status.text status from charge_standard,status where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and charge_standard.statusId=status.id

select charge_standard.id, charge_standard.name, status.text status,charge_standard.statusId,charge_mode.name mode from charge_standard,status,charge_mode where charge_standard.statusId = status.id and charge_standard.modeId=charge_mode.id
select DISTINCT * from charge_standard where charge_standard.name=#{standardName}
